feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:40 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 5:53 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
